meanings.definition: The quality or state of being casual.
meanings.sent1: Her casualnesses in dressing made her stand out in the formal event.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the casualnesses of our conversations; they feel relaxed and easy.
meanings.sent3: His casualnesses in following the rules sometimes lead to funny situations.
meanings.sent4: The casualnesses of the ocean waves hitting the shore reminded me of carefree days.
meanings.sent5: The casualnesses of her smile made everyone feel at ease.

meanings.sent4: His casualnesses in playing the piano were like a dance of free spirits.
